name: Foli

skills.name: Marked for Destruction
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 4 times. Has a 20% chance placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.name: Biodistruptor
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 4 times at random. Each hit has a 35% chance placing a [Leech] debuff for 2 turns.Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Sealed Fate
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies, decreases their Turn Meter by 15%, then attacks the targeted enemy. Enemies killed by this attack cannot be revived.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Living Armor
skills.raw_description:
Heals this Champion by 20% of their MAX HP and boosts the Turn Meter by 50% whenever an enemy places a [Stun], [Freeze], [Sleep], or [Provoke] on this Champion
Immediately removes all [Stun], [Freeze], [Sleep], and [Provoke] debuffs from this Champion.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1

seo.description: Dark Elves is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 30 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: Fallen from grace in their homelands of Aravia, the Dark Elves inhabit the forests that border the realms of Teleria. They see persecutions in Kaerok rather as a boon than a bane supplying them with a stream of silver. They have set up tolls for those anxious to pass safely, but woe betide those who cannot pay.

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Foli is a legendary attack champion from the faction Dark Elves doing magic damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

structured_data.description: Member of the faction Dark Elves, Foli is a champion of Legendary rarity and of Attack type
structured_data.name: Foli

default_description: Foli is a legendary attack champion from the faction Dark Elves doing magic damage
lore:
Foli's origins are shrouded in mystery. Some say he was among the first Elves to have been banished from the Kingdom of Aravia for dabbling in the forbidden Dark Arts. Others - that he was unjustly persecuted by his political rivals and forced into exile. Foli himself certainly cares little for rumours and legends, his focus remains on the present and his role in the war against Siroth. For decades, he worked alone, striking alliances and backroom deals with numerous powerful figures across Teleria. His goal was ever the same - to uproot the servants of darkness wherever they could be found, by whatever means necessary.

His natural talents are enhanced manyfold by the strange armour he wears. Whether created by magical means, or a symbiotic creature eons-old, this living carapace provides exceptional protection and vitality. Crushing blows that would daze and debilitate lesser warriors seem to have little effect, wounds mend as fast as they would beneath a skilled healer's touch, and the armour itself serves as a terrifying extension of Foli's arsenal.

Such an elusive Champion is not easy to recruit, yet if his loyalty is gained few foes will be able to stand in his Company's way.
